tool_description: Validates proposed work order assignments against scheduling constraints, resource availability, and business rules.

allow_conflicts.description: Whether to allow minor scheduling conflicts

error_messages: Invalid assignment format: Assignments must follow 'work_order_id:technician_id:scheduled_time' format
Scheduling conflict: One or more assignments conflict with existing schedules
Resource unavailable: Assigned technician is not available at scheduled time
Invalid validation level: Use one of [basic, standard, strict]
usage: Provide assignment proposals to validate against system constraints. Use validation_level to control thoroughness of checks.

validation_status.description: Overall validation result: passed, failed, or warning
